verses.verse: "I <S%H3045>know<s%> that Thou <S%H3201>canst<s%> do <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things,<s%> And that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4209>purpose<s%> of Thine can be <S%H1219>thwarted.<s%>

<S%H4310>'Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that <S%H5956>hides<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?' <S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> I have <S%H5046>declared<s%> that which I did not <S%H995>understand,<s%> <S%H6381>Things<s%> <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> for me, which I did not <S%H3045>know.<s%>"
<S%H8085>'Hear,<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak;<s%> I will <S%H7592>ask<s%> Thee, and do Thou <S%H3045>instruct<s%> me.'
"I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of Thee by the <S%H8088>hearing<s%> of the <S%H241>ear;<s%> But <S%H6258>now<s%> my <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> Thee;

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H347>Job,<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite,<s%> "My <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against you and against your <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7453>friends,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of Me what is <S%H3559>right<s%> as My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> has.

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, <S%H3947>take<s%> for yourselves <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> and <S%H5927>offer<s%> up a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> for yourselves, and My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> will <S%H6419>pray<s%> for you. For I will <S%H6440>accept<s%> <S%H5375><s%> him <S%H1115>so<s%> that I may not <S%H6213>do<s%> with you [according to your] <S%H5039>folly,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> of Me what is <S%H3559>right,<s%> as My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> has."

"So <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite<s%> and <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%> [and] <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> them; and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5375>accepted<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H347>Job.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H7622>fortunes<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%> when he <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for his <S%H7453>friends,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3254>increased<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H347>Job<s%> had <S%H4932>twofold.<s%>

Then <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H269>sisters,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> who had <S%H3045>known<s%> him <S%H6440>before,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to him, and they <S%H398>ate<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with him in his <S%H1004>house;<s%> and they <S%H5110>consoled<s%> him and <S%H5162>comforted<s%> him for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9567>evil<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H935>brought<s%> on him. And <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7192>piece<s%> of <S%H7192>money,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> a <S%H5141>ring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H319>latter<s%> [days] of <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> his <S%H7225>beginning,<s%> and he <S%H1961>had<s%> 14000 <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and 6000 <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and 1000 <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and 1000 <S%H860>female<s%> <S%H860>donkeys.<s%>
And he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3224>Jemimah,<s%> and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H7103>Keziah,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> Keren-happuch.

And in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> so <S%H3303>fair<s%> as Job's <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and their father <S%H1>gave<s%> them <S%H5414>inheritance<s%> <S%H5159>among<s%> their <S%H8432>brothers.<s%>
